app.skill.impl.regex

Class RegexSkill

  • java.lang.Object
    • app.skill.DefaultSkillImpl
      • app.skill.impl.regex.RegexSkill
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ISkill
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractLookupSkill, CountUsersSkill, DateSkill, DaySkill, ListSkillsSkill, LogSizeSkill, PersonalLogSizeSkill, TimeSkill

    public class RegexSkill
extends DefaultSkillImpl
    This ISkill represents a generic ISkill that matches regular expressions as input, and randomly outputs a reply.
